name: py-csvkit
description:
A library of utilities for working with CSV, the king of tabular file
formats

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-ordereddict
dependencies.description:
A drop-in substitute for Py2.7's new collections. OrderedDict that works
in Python 2.4-2.6.

dependencies.name: py-simplejson
dependencies.description: Simplejson is a simple, fast, extensible JSON encoder/decoder for Python

dependencies.name: py-python-dateutil
dependencies.description: Extensions to the standard Python datetime module.

dependencies.name: py-dbf
dependencies.description:
Pure python package for reading/writing dBase, FoxPro, and Visual FoxPro
.dbf files (including memos)

dependencies.name: py-xlrd
dependencies.description:
Library for developers to extract data from Microsoft Excel (tm)
spreadsheet files

dependencies.name: py-sqlalchemy
dependencies.description: The Python SQL Toolkit and Object Relational Mapper

dependencies.name: py-openpyxl
dependencies.description: A Python library to read/write Excel 2010 xlsx/xlsm files

dependencies.name: py-agate
dependencies.description:
agate is a Python data analysis library that is optimized for humans
instead of machines. It is an alternative to numpy and pandas that
solves real-world problems with readable code.

dependencies.name: py-agate-excel
dependencies.description: agate-excel adds read support for Excel files (xls and xlsx) to agate.

dependencies.name: py-agate-dbf
dependencies.description: agate-dbf adds read support for dbf files to agate.

dependencies.name: py-agate-sql
dependencies.description: agate-sql adds SQL read/write support to agate.
